parameters: \N<Food Vendor>I have the finest ingredients right here.
The King is having no visitors at this time
The King is having no visitors at this time
\N<Tool Merchant>I sell only the finest tools too the most noble.
GabText I guess... I'm surprised \n[3] just left after the ceremony though.
GabText Haha, did you expect him to stick around?
GabText The entire western wing of the castle is in ruin though, dozens are dead!
GabText What's \n[3] going to do about that?
GabText \n[3] is not a \V[15], \n[1], he's a hero.
GabText Well, I am a \V[15] and I'm going to help rebuild.
GabText You don't know the first thing about rebuilding.
The King is having no visitors at this time
The King is having no visitors at this time
The King is having no visitors at this time
\N<Harold>Oh boy am I glad to see you!
\N<Harold>Don't tell me you don't remember old uncle Harold?!
\af[1]\n<\N[1]>Um, \n[2]. Sorry Harold, I... I don't remember you.
\N<Harold>It's me! Harry, I worked with your dad back on the farm - "Best carpenter in in the village of Edge" is what they use to say.
\N<Harold>It's ok \n[1], I don't blame you for not remembering, it's been years...\. I actually work in the castle now,
\N<Harold>Which brings me to my point. As you can imagine, mason workers and carpenters have quite the task on their hands rebuilding and reinforcing these walls after the goblin attack.
\N<Harold>Er... uh, actually, \n[1], I need you help in a different way.
\N<Harold>I need you to head back to Edge and meet with the local \V[15] guild. See if they could send more builders.
\N<Harold>Good, good, I don't think anyone has had a chance to really venture out of the castle since it's been attacked.
\af[2]\n<\N[2]>You mean no one even know's if Edge is actually still safe?  Were no guards posted at the village watchtowers?
\N<Harold>I'm not a guard, I'm not part of the military I don't know procedures. I just know we need all the help we can get rebuilding.
\N<Harold>I've been sent straight from the \n[4] to find you. Don't think your skills have gone unnoticed.
\N<Harold>We know both of you can fight, so if the situation in Edge is dicey... well, you can handle yourself.
\af[2]\n<\N[2]>Indeed, I think we've proven we can handle ourselves. Let's go \n[1].
\N<Harold>We need all hands on deck here. Good luck!
\af[2]\n<\N[2]>We should prepare ourselves, some of these castle vendors can be a little stuffy but we should try to unload some of our gear for coin.
